name: DomainValidatorStartupTest
description: Tests for the startup behavior and TLD overrides of the DomainValidator class.

test_cases.name: testCannotUpdate
test_cases.description: Tests that updating TLD overrides after initialization throws an IllegalStateException.

test_cases.name: testInstanceOverride
test_cases.description: Tests that the instance of DomainValidator picks up static TLD overrides and can be overridden for a new instance.

test_cases.name: testUpdateBaseArrayCC
test_cases.description: Tests that updating the COUNTRY_CODE_RO array throws an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: testUpdateBaseArrayGeneric
test_cases.description: Tests that updating the GENERIC_RO array throws an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: testUpdateBaseArrayInfra
test_cases.description: Tests that updating the INFRASTRUCTURE_RO array throws an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: testUpdateBaseArrayLocal
test_cases.description: Tests that updating the LOCAL_RO array throws an IllegalArgumentException.

test_cases.name: testUpdateCountryCode1a
test_cases.description: Tests that 'com' is not a valid country code TLD by default.

test_cases.name: testUpdateCountryCode1b
test_cases.description: Tests that 'com' can be made a valid country code TLD after an update.

test_cases.name: testUpdateCountryCode2
test_cases.description: Tests that 'com' is invalid after both adding and removing it from the country code TLD list.

test_cases.name: testUpdateCountryCode3a
test_cases.description: Tests that 'ch' is a valid country code TLD by default.

test_cases.name: testUpdateCountryCode3b
test_cases.description: Tests that 'ch' can be made an invalid country code TLD after an update.

test_cases.name: testUpdateCountryCode3c
test_cases.description: Tests that 'ch' can be made valid again after replacing the country code TLD array.

test_cases.name: testUpdateGeneric1
test_cases.description: Tests that 'ch' is not a valid generic TLD by default.

test_cases.name: testUpdateGeneric2
test_cases.description: Tests that 'ch' can be made a valid generic TLD after an update.

test_cases.name: testUpdateGeneric3
test_cases.description: Tests that 'ch' is invalid after both adding and removing it from the generic TLD list.

test_cases.name: testUpdateGeneric4
test_cases.description: Tests that 'com' is invalid after removing it from the generic TLD list.

test_cases.name: testUpdateGeneric5
test_cases.description: Tests that 'com' is valid again after replacing the generic TLD array.

test_cases.name: testValidator412a
test_cases.description: Tests that 'local' and 'pvt' are not valid generic TLDs by default.

test_cases.name: testValidator412b
test_cases.description: Tests that 'local' and 'pvt' can be made valid generic TLDs after an update.

test_cases.name: testValidator412c
test_cases.description: Tests that 'local' and 'pvt' are not valid local TLDs by default.

test_cases.name: testValidator412d
test_cases.description: Tests that 'local' and 'pvt' can be made valid local TLDs after an update.
